mapper.select: select mno, username, title, content, write_date writeDate, send_id sendId, recipient_id recipientId, msg_check msgCheck, is_send_message isSendMessage, is_reciver_message isReciverMessage from message
mapper.insert: insert into message(mno, username, title, content, write_date, send_id ,recipent_id, msg_check, is_send_message, is_reciver_message) values(#{mno},#{username},#{title},#{content},sysdate,,#{sendId},#{recipentId}, #{msgCheck},#{isSendMessage},#{isReciverMessage})
mapper.delete: delete from message where mno=#{mno} and rownum=1
